title: YouTube Content Creator & Channel Manager
job_overview:
Hello!

I’m looking for a YouTube expert to help grow my channel and get it monetized (1,000 subs & 4,000 watch hours).


Requirements: 
Create + edit videos (YouTube Shorts & full videos)

Use hashtags, titles, thumbnails to grow fast
Follow trending topics
Post 2–3 videos per week
Must have experience growing channels


What We Offer:
Flexible work schedule.
Competitive pay with performance bonuses.
Opportunity for long-term work and growth.

How to Apply:
Send your portfolio, YouTube channels you’ve worked on, or links to channels. My Email is Upgrade to see actual info
